title: Bookworm
description: Developed a full-stack book review application using the MERN stack, allowing users to search for, review, and tag books. Implemented features like user authentication, personalized profiles, and a dynamic tagging system to enhance the user experience.

title: Psychic Hustle
description: Designed and developed a 2D turn-based RPG in Unity featuring EarthBound-inspired combat and a unique debt-based progression system. Implemented modular battle mechanics, extensible move creation, and stat scaling using ScriptableObjects and C#.
